title: Oxford dictionaries change 'sexist' and outdated definitions of the word 'woman'
description: Even the dictionary can be sexist and out of date, especially when it comes to how a "woman" is described.

title: We asked US voters to tell us what they think about the result
description: We asked voters to share their thoughts about the historic 2020 US election and their new President-elect. They left us tons of voicemails. Here's what they had to say.

title: 10 million people have been infected with coronavirus in the US
description: In less than 10 months, the US went from one known coronavirus infection to 10 million.

title: The UAE takes steps towards modernization by decriminalizing alcohol and suicide
description: The United Arab Emirates has introduced a slew of reforms on personal status and penal laws as part of a years-long bid to modernize the Gulf state and promote a progressive brand of Islam.

title: You called, we listened: What thousands of readers' voicemails reveal about the election
description: Many of you are ecstatic. Relieved. Say you feel safe.

title: Here's who's on President-elect Biden's Transition Covid-19 Advisory Board
Trump's firing of his defense chief could be the start of a wild 72 days
Here's who's on Biden's Transition Covid-19 Advisory Board
description: President-elect Joe Biden and Vice President-elect Kamala Harris' newly appointed Transition Covid-19 Advisory Board is led by established public health officials and staffed by a mix of doctors and current and former government officials, some with high-profile media visibility.

title: Trump's firing of his defense chief could be the start of a wild 72 days
description: • CIA boss's fate uncertain after Esper firing

title: There's no such thing as too many Apple events
description: Less than 24 hours before the Election Day, Apple announced it would host its fourth major event of the year the following week.

title: Azerbaijan claims capture of key city in Nagorno-Karabakh
description: Azerbaijan claims it has captured the strategic city of Shusha in the disputed enclave of Nagorno-Karabakh, which sits in Azerbaijani territory but is populated and controlled by ethnic Armenians.

title: Not all global leaders have been forthcoming in acknowledging the projected victors of the 2020 US presidential election
description: • China sidesteps US election 'congratulations' question

title: Trump adviser overseeing President's legal challenges gets coronavirus
description: An adviser for President Donald Trump's campaign, David Bossie, has tested positive for coronavirus only days after he was tapped to oversee the campaign's legal challenges contesting the outcome of the election, two sources confirmed to CNN.

title: Carl Bernstein on Trump's refusal to acknowledge defeat: The President is in a rage
description: CNN political analyst Carl Bernstein reacts to how Trump's refusal to acknowledge defeat and accept the will of the people is dangerous for the country

title: Ben Carson is the latest Trump official to test positive for coronavirus
description: Housing and Urban Development Secretary Ben Carson tested positive for coronavirus Monday morning, his deputy chief of staff Coalter Baker confirmed to CNN.

title: Female mongooses start fights and then sneak off to mate with the enemy
description: Female mongooses looking to mate with a male from a rival gang have developed a crafty method to cheat on their partners -- by starting fights, and using the violence as cover.

title: Premier League soccer stars impacted by new strain of Covid-19 found in Danish mink farms
description: A new variant of Covid-19 found in Danish mink farms is disrupting the plans of international football teams for their upcoming fixtures, with UK-based footballers, including eight Premier League stars, notably affected.

title: Trump's refusal to accept loss puts transition work on hold
description: The business of transferring power between President Donald Trump and President-elect Joe Biden seemed on hold Monday as the incumbent plotted a messaging blitz to amplify his baseless claims of fraud even as his inner circle split over his ongoing refusal to accept the results of the 2020 election.

title: Pfizer says early analysis shows its Covid-19 vaccine is 90% effective
As the number of ex-players with dementia grows, soccer needs to act
description: The 1960s were in full swing. The Beatles and The Stones topped the charts, shoppers flocked to Carnaby Street and the mini skirt and Mini car were in maximum demand.

title: Military carrier pigeon message turns up 110 years after it was sent
description: A message lost by a carrier pigeon has been found some 110 years after it was sent.

title: Eyes on Barrett, Kavanaugh and Gorsuch as Supreme Court decides Obamacare's future
description: The Supreme Court's new review of the Affordable Care Act presents a test for the three justices appointed by President Donald Trump, as health insurance for millions of Americans is at risk and the court's legitimacy remains under attack.

title: One of Jupiter's moons may glow in the dark
description: Jupiter's icy moon Europa is considered one of only a few bodies in our solar system that has the potential to host some form of life.

title: Watch: People travel in Virgin Hyperloop for the first time
description: Virgin Hyperloop completed the first test of its high-speed transportation technology with humans on board. The company's hyperloop pod traveled 500 meters and reached speeds of 100mph.

title: The most important line in Joe Biden's victory speech
description: On Saturday night, President-elect Joe Biden did something the man he will replace in the White House never did in four years: He reached out the people who didn't vote for him.

title: This company has a contract to turn moon dust into oxygen
description: A British company is hoping to turn dust from the moon's surface into oxygen — a project that could pave the way for further exploration and even habitation of the satellite.

title: SoftBank's big bet on listed tech stocks cost it $1.3 billion
description: Billionaire tycoon Masayoshi Son's huge bets in recent months on listed tech stocks didn't pay off.

title: 'The Crown' Season 4: Recreating more unforgettable looks from royal history
description: Netflix's "The Crown" has been critically acclaimed for its dramatic portrayal of Britain's royal family, thanks in large part to its keen attention to detail. Everything from the elaborate set design to luxurious costumes have been carefully reconstructed over the course of three seasons.

title: CNN's John Avlon breaks down the US election results
description: CNN's John Avlon breaks down the 2020 US election results, comparing president-elect Joe Biden's performance to Hillary Clinton's in 2016.

title: The person who bet $1.3 million on a Biden win hasn't been paid yet
description: The US election still hasn't ended for one person who bet £1 million ($1.3 million) on Joe Biden to be the next president.

title: Why Kamala Harris' white suit speaks volumes
description: As soon as Kamala Harris took to the stage in Wilmington, Delaware, on Saturday night, social media was abuzz with talk of her outfit. It was a telling sign, for better or worse, of the public scrutiny her fashion will face in the coming years.

title: Fear of outright war in Ethiopia grows as PM presses military offensive
description: Ethiopia's prime minister stepped up a military offensive in the northern region of Tigray on Sunday with air strikes as part of what he called a "law enforcement operation," increasing fears of outright civil war in Africa's second-most populous country.

title: Apple suspends new business with iPhone supplier that used students on night shifts
description: Apple is putting one of its suppliers on probation for violating its labor code.

title: The only place in the world experiencing overtourism right now
description: The coronavirus pandemic has decimated the travel industry, as hotels, restaurants and airlines in destinations around the world find themselves going broke or dramatically cutting back costs as they try to survive.

title: The US-China rivalry in tech and trade won't end because Joe Biden is president
description: President Donald Trump spent much of his term setting up Beijing as Washington's greatest political and economic adversary. Don't expect drastic changes when Joe Biden takes the helm, even if he eschews the bluster and unpredictability of his predecessor.

title: The world's largest canvas painting finished
description: Grounded in Dubai during the pandemic, artist Sacha Jafri created "The Journey of Humanity," which represents connection, separation and isolation

title: Snake venom is a boon in search for life-saving drugs
description: Over the summer, Chicago-based cardiologist Dr. Sandeep Nathan received a phone call that a patient was in trouble.

title: See the letter H. W. Bush left Clinton after losing election
description: President Donald Trump joins a list of 10 presidents who lost a re-election campaign. Here are two examples of how former presidents John Quincy Adams and George H. W. Bush handled passing the baton.

title: Scientists discover two new marsupial species in Australia
description: If you take a walk through the forests of Australia's east coast, you might come across the greater glider -- a possum-sized marsupial with big ears and a long furry tail, that glides from tree to tree.

title: Japan formally declares Prince Akishino heir to the throne
description: Japan formally declared Crown Prince Akishino heir to the throne on Sunday, after his elder brother Emperor Naruhito became monarch last year following their father's abdication.

title: See how world reacts to US presidential election results
description: CNN's Nic Robertson takes a look at how the world reacts to Joe Biden's win over Donald Trump in the 2020 US presidential election.

title: They learned English -- and how to be American -- from watching Alex Trebek
description: Elly Shariat spoke only Farsi when she moved to the US from Iran as a young girl. But when her father introduced her to "Jeopardy!" her world opened up.

title: What Wolf Blitzer thought of 'SNL's' latest CNN spoof
description: Wolf Blitzer has been portrayed by several "Saturday Night Live" cast members over the years, with the latest impersonation coming hours after the 2020 presidential race was called for Joe Biden. The Situation Room anchor weighs in with his thoughts on the show's multiple Blitzers.

title: We should fear a lame-duck President Trump
description: As the last remaining states count their ballots, many Americans are likely worried about the transition of power and what a lame-duck President Donald Trump might do in the short months before he leaves office.
